ygData.subject: Re: SK's of Pallies?
ygData.msgSnippet: I think one thing you are forgetting about Engulfing Darkness is that you can still use F7 and F8 to target the necro and his pet. Even if he is blinded the
ygData.messageBody:
I think one thing you are forgetting about
Engulfing Darkness is that you can still use F7 and F8 to
target the necro and his pet. Even if he is blinded the
pally could target and bash the skelly to pieces and
then target teh necro and turn on auto attack (If
necro is hitting pally, and pally is not hitting necro
pally is facing wrong dirction) and start casting his
spells. I am not saying the pally would win, but if the
necro wasn't careful an experianced pally could do
major harm. Of course the necro has Shadow Step up his
sleve in case things get nasty... as long as he rembers
not to burn out all his mana.<br><br>Pirotes<br>DE
Warrior<br>Mith. Marr
